Title: Sahib Bibi Aur Ghulam
Writer: Abrar Alvi (dialogue), François-Xavier Durandy (French adaptation), Bimal Mitra (novel)
Actors: Meena Kumari, Guru Dutt, Rehman, Waheeda Rehman
Plot: A lowly servant, Bhognath gets close to the wife of his employer and narrates her story through his eyes and perspective.
